(zuòyòng de yòng)
item.A:
to use
作用 zuòyòng action; activity; actions; acts; effect; to play a role

item.Q:
Write the character: gōng
(chénggōng de gōng)
item.A:
merit; achievement; result; service; accomplishment; work (phys.)
成功 chénggōng success; to succeed

item.Q:
Write the character: kè
(kèchéng de kè)
item.A:
traditional: 課
subject; class; lesson
课程 (課程) kèchéng course; class

item.Q:
Write the character: táng
(shítáng de táng)
item.A:
(main) hall; large room
食堂 shítáng dining hall

item.Q:
Write the character: rèn
(rènwéi de rèn)
item.A:
traditional: 認
to recognize; to know; to admit
认为 (認為) rènwéi to believe; to think; to consider; to feel

item.Q:
Write the character: zhēn
(zhēnzhèng de zhēn)
item.A:
real; true; genuine
真正 zhēnzhèng real; true; genuine

item.Q:
Write the character: jiǎng
(jiǎnghuà de jiǎng)
item.A:
讲 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 講
to speak; to explain; a speech; a lecture
讲话 (講話) jiǎnghuà a speech; to speak; to talk; to address

item.Q:
Write the character: jiě
(jiějué de jiě)
item.A:
解 (strokes unavailable)
to divide; to break up; to split; to separate; to dissolve; to solve; to melt; to remove; to untie; to loosen; to open; to emancipate; to explain; to understand; to know; a solution; a dissection
解决 (解決) jiějué to settle (a dispute); to resolve; to solve

item.Q:
Write the character: jìn
(jìnliàng de jìn)
item.A:
尽 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 盡
to use up; to exhaust; to end; to finish; to the utmost; exhausted; finished; to the limit (of sth)
尽量 (盡量) jìnliàng as much as possible; to the greatest extent

item.Q:
Write the character: jǐn
(jǐnliàng de jǐn)
item.A:
尽 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 盡
to exhaust
尽量 (盡量) jǐnliàng as much as possible

item.Q:
Write the character: liàng
(zhìliàng de liàng)
item.A:
capacity; quantity; amount; to estimate
质量 (質量) zhìliàng quality; mass (in physics)

item.Q:
Write the character: liáng
(cèliáng de liáng)
item.A:
to measure
测量 (測量) cèliáng survey; to gauge; to determine

item.Q:
Write the character: jiāo
(jiāohuàn de jiāo)
item.A:
to deliver; to turn over; to make friends; to intersect (lines); to pay (money)
交换 (交換) jiāohuàn to exchange; to swap; (telecom) to switch; (math.) to commute; (math.) commutative

item.Q:
Write the character: tán
(tándào de tán)
item.A:
谈 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 談
to speak; to talk; to converse; to chat; to discuss; surname Tan
谈到 (談到) tándào to refer to; to speak about; to talk about

item.Q:
Write the character: fù
(fùqin de fù)
item.A:
father
父亲 (父親) fùqin father

item.Q:
Write the character: fǔ
(fǔquánzhì de fǔ)
item.A:
father
父权制 (父權制) fǔquánzhì patriarchy

item.Q:
Write the character: mǔ
(mǔqīn de mǔ)
item.A:
female; mother
母亲 (母親) mǔqīn mother (formal)

item.Q:
Write the character: tiē
(bǔtiē de tiē)
item.A:
贴 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 貼
to stick; to paste; to keep close to; to fit snugly; subsidize; allowance
补贴 (補貼) bǔtiē subsidy; allowance

item.Q:
Write the character: yóu
(yóudiàn de yóu)
item.A:
traditional: 郵
post (office); mail
邮电 (郵電) yóudiàn post and telecommunications

item.Q:
Write the character: piào
(tóupiào de piào)
item.A:
bank note; ticket; a vote
投票 tóupiào to vote; vote

item.Q:
Write the character: píng
(hépíng de píng)
item.A:
flat; level; equal; to tie (make the same score); to draw (score); calm; peaceful; level or even tone (i.e. first and second tones in classical Chinese); surname Ping
和平 hépíng peace

item.Q:
Write the character: yóu
(yóudiàn de yóu)
item.A:
traditional: 郵
post (office); mail
邮电 (郵電) yóudiàn post and telecommunications

item.Q:
Write the character: háng
(hángxíng de háng)
item.A:
boat; ship; vessel; craft; to navigate; to sail
航行 hángxíng sail or fly (in air, water, or space); to navigate

item.Q:
Write the character: kōng
(kōngqì de kōng)
item.A:
air; sky; empty; free time; in vain
空气 (空氣) kōngqì air; atmosphere

item.Q:
Write the character: kòng
(kòngxì de kòng)
item.A:
emptied; leisure
空隙 kòngxì crack; gap between two objects; gap in time between two events

item.Q:
Write the character: tōng
(tōngguò de tōng)
item.A:
go through; know well; to connect; to communicate; open
通过 (通過) tōngguò by means of; through; via; to adopt; to pass through; to get through; to switch over

item.Q:
Write the character: cháng
(jīngcháng de cháng)
item.A:
always; ever; often; frequently; common; general; constant; surname Chang
经常 (經常) jīngcháng day to day; everyday; daily; frequently; constantly; regularly; often

item.Q:
Write the character: zuǒ
(zuǒyòu de zuǒ)
item.A:
left; surname Zuo
左右 zuǒyòu about; approximately; left and right; around

item.Q:
Write the character: yòu
(zuǒyòu de yòu)
item.A:
right (-hand)
左右 zuǒyòu about; approximately; left and right; around

item.Q:
Write the character: fāng
(fāngfǎ de fāng)
item.A:
square; quadrilateral; direction; one side; just; surname Fang
方法 fāngfǎ method; way; means

item.Q:
Write the character: fǎ
(fāngfǎ de fǎ)
item.A:
law; method; way; Buddhist teaching; Legalist; abbr. for France
方法 fāngfǎ method; way; means

item.Q:
Write the character: xiàn
(xiànzhì de xiàn)
item.A:
限 (strokes unavailable)
limit; bound
限制 xiànzhì (impose) restrictions; to limit; to bound; to restrict

item.Q:
Write the character: shí
(tóngshí de shí)
item.A:
traditional: 時
o'clock; time; when; hour; season; period; surname Shi
同时 (同時) tóngshí at the same time; simultaneously

item.Q:
Write the character: xìn
(xìnhào de xìn)
item.A:
letter; true; to believe; sign; evidence
信号 (信號) xìnhào signal

item.Q:
Write the character: yuē
(dàyuē de yuē)
item.A:
traditional: 約
appointment; agreement; to arrange; to restrict; approximately
大约 (大約) dàyuē approximately; about

item.Q:
Write the character: tì
(dàitì de tì)
item.A:
替 (strokes unavailable)
to substitute for; to take the place of; to replace; for; on behalf of; to stand in for
代替 dàitì instead; to replace; to substitute (X for Y, or a number in an algebraic expression)

item.Q:
Write the character: gù
(bùgù de gù)
item.A:
顾 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 顧
look after; take into consideration; to attend to; surname Gu
不顾 (不顧) bùgù in spite of; regardless of

item.Q:
Write the character: kè
(kèguān de kè)
item.A:
customer; visitor; guest
客观 (客觀) kèguān objective

item.Q:
Write the character: chuán
(chuántǒng de chuán)
item.A:
传 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 傳
to pass on; to spread; to transmit; to infect; to transfer; to circulate; to pass on; to conduct (electricity)
传统 (傳統) chuántǒng tradition; convention

item.Q:
Write the character: zhuàn
(hǎishànghuālièzhuàn de zhuàn)
item.A:
传 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 傳
biography
海上花列传 (海上花列傳) hǎishànghuālièzhuàn The Sing-Song Girls of Shanghai by Han Bangqing 韓邦慶|韩邦庆, long novel of lower life in classical Chinese and Jiangsu vernacular; translated into Putonghua as 海上花 by Iris Chang

item.Q:
Write the character: zhēn
(zhēnzhèng de zhēn)
item.A:
real; true; genuine
真正 zhēnzhèng real; true; genuine

item.Q:
Write the character: kuài
(kuàisù de kuài)
item.A:
fast; quick; swift
快速 kuàisù fast; high-speed; rapid

item.Q:
Write the character: màn
(mànmàn de màn)
item.A:
slow
慢慢 mànmàn slowly

item.Q:
Write the character: lì
(jiànlì de lì)
item.A:
set up; to stand
建立 jiànlì creation; set up; construction; build; establish; set up

item.Q:
Write the character: kè
(shēnkè de kè)
item.A:
quarter (hour); moment; to carve; to engrave; to cut; oppressive; (classifier for short time intervals)
深刻 shēnkè profound; deep; deep-going

item.Q:
Write the character: fā
(fāzhǎn de fā)
item.A:
traditional: 發
to send out; to show (one's feeling); to issue; to develop; (classifier for gunshots, "rounds")
发展 (發展) fāzhǎn development; growth; to develop; to grow; to expand

item.Q:
Write the character: shōu
(xīshōu de shōu)
item.A:
to receive; to accept; to collect; in care of (used on address line after name)
吸收 xīshōu to absorb; to assimilate; to ingest

item.Q:
Write the character: xìn
(xìnhào de xìn)
item.A:
letter; true; to believe; sign; evidence
信号 (信號) xìnhào signal

item.Q:
Write the character: rén
(rénmín de rén)
item.A:
man; person; people
人民 rénmín the people

item.Q:
Write the character: hào
(xìnhào de hào)
item.A:
traditional: 號
day of a month; (suffix used after) name of a ship; (ordinal) number
信号 (信號) xìnhào signal

item.Q:
Write the character: háo
(āiháo de háo)
item.A:
traditional: 號
roar; cry
哀号 (哀號) āiháo cry piteously; wail

item.Q:
Write the character: mǎ
(mǎtóu de mǎ)
item.A:
traditional: 碼
a weight; number; yard (unit of length equal to 0.914 m.); pile; stack
码头 (碼頭) mǎtóu dock; pier; wharf

item.Q:
Write the character: bāng
(bāngzhù de bāng)
item.A:
traditional: 幫
to assist; to support; to help; group; gang; party
帮助 (幫助) bāngzhù assistance; aid; to help; to assist

item.Q:
Write the character: máng
(jímáng de máng)
item.A:
busy
急忙 jímáng hastily

mìjí concentrated; compressed

xùnliàn drill; exercise; train; training

jìnbù progress

traditional: 課堂
kètáng classroom

traditional: 認真
rènzhēn earnest; serious; take seriously; take to heart

traditional: 講解
jiǎngjiě to explain

traditional: 盡量
jìnliàng as much as possible; to the greatest extent
jǐnliàng as much as possible

traditional: 交談
jiāotán talk with each other; converse; chat
fùmǔ father and mother; parents

traditional: 貼
tiē to stick; to paste; to keep close to; to fit snugly; subsidize; allowance

traditional: 郵票
yóupiào (postage) stamp
hángkōng aviation

xiànshí restricted time

yuē appointment; agreement; to arrange; to restrict; approximately
yāo weigh

traditional: 顧客
gùkè client; customer

chuánzhēn fax; facsimile
